titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 493) to give the President legislative, line-item veto rescission authority over appropriations bills and targeted tax benefits in revenue bills.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 9/27/1993--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 493 (presidential legislative, line-item veto rescission authority over appropriations bills and targeted tax benefits in revenue bills).
